name: Classic Mahjong
description:
You just discovered a great mahjong app!

No adverts, so you can enjoy playing mahjong without interruptions!

This app is packed full of features, including...

- Lion support for full screen.
- 39 Fun Layouts to play.
- 3 Fun game modes. (Standard, Four Rivers, and Concentration).
- 16 Colorful backgrounds.
- Great sound effects.
- Automatic saving/loading.
- 10 Great tiles graphics.
- Full Undo/Redo.

So, if you are after a fun mahjong app to play, that will keep you occupied for years, why not check it out?
